tool.name: Remove spurious
tool.command:
rm_spurious_events.py #if $positional_1 and $positional_1 is not None: $positional_1 #end if
#if $threshold and $threshold is not None: --threshold $threshold #end if --outfile $default
tool.help:
Remove spurious events originating from errors in random sequence tags.
This tool compares all events sharing the same coordinates. Among each group of events the maximum number of PCR duplicates is determined. All events that are supported by less than 10 percent of this maximum count are removed.
Input::
* bed6 file containing crosslinking events with score field set to number of PCR duplicates
Output::
* bed6 file with spurious crosslinking events removed, sorted by fields chrom, start, stop, strand
